title: Mindfulness Meditation Session
description: Practice mindfulness and breathing exercises to reduce stress and enhance mental clarity.

title: Chair Yoga for Flexibility
description: A gentle yoga session using chairs for support, focusing on flexibility and joint health.

title: Senior Book Club Meetup
description: Join our monthly book discussion with fellow readers and share your favorite stories.

title: Healthy Aging Nutrition Talk
description: Learn from a nutritionist about diet choices that support healthy aging and vitality.

title: Community Walk & Talk
description: Enjoy a light walk in the park while chatting and connecting with peers.
